```{r}
library(tidyverse
        )
Day <- c("Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday")
Temp <- c(12, 13, 14)
Precip <- c(20, 10, 10)
Humidity <- c(69, 65, 63)
Wind <- c(21, 10, 8)
stats <- c(Temp, Precip, Humidity, Wind)

weather_matrix <- matrix(c(stats),
                  nrow = 4, ncol = 3,
                  dimnames = list(c("Temperature", 
                                    "Precipitation","Humidity","Wind"),
                                  c(Day)))
```
```{r}
weather_matrix
```

```{r}
weather_matrix[[3, 1]]
```
